Title: Bangladesh’s RPGCL seeks one first-half March LNG cargo
Description: Bangladesh’s state-owned Rupantarita Prakritik Gas Co. (RPGCL) has issued a tender to buy one cargo for delivery on Mar. 12-13 to either of the country’s two LNG receiving terminals, the 3.8 mtpa Summit LNG floating storage and regasification unit or the 3.8 mtpa Moheshkhali FSRU. The tender closes on Feb. 20.
Author: CK

Title: Pakistan seeks two first-half March LNG through first tender for the year
Description: State-owned Pakistan LNG (PLL) has issued a tender to buy two cargoes for delivery on Mar. 2-3 and 10-11 to its Pakistan GasPort LNG receiving terminal in Port Qasim. The tender closes on Feb. 22 and is the firm’s first for the year since it closed its last tender on Nov. 5.
Author: CK
